subject: Automobile Racing
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: A lawyer for Kevin Ward Jr., a driver who was killed when he was hit by Tony Stewart’s racecar last year, said Stewart’s legal claims in response to a lawsuit were “appalling.”
snippet: A lawyer for Kevin Ward Jr., a driver who was killed when he was hit by Tony Stewart’s racecar last year, said Stewart’s legal claims in response to a lawsuit were “appalling.”
